text:
Amazing service.  The food came slightly faster than usual & extremely tasty. Good job, team & all the staff in the kitchen & the rest.

You guys reading this, please support Andes Astons by APSN. It's an amazing taste, pleasant location & affordable.

Good job, guys! Desmond, Paul & the crews, forgive me if i missed out the names: Sarah, Kenny & the rest! Handling 25 of us its not easy so kudos!

Very pleasant environment. Big tables and spacious layout, even have private rooms for events. Aircon was cooling!
Staff were extremely polite, hardworking and warm.
Very attentive to details, am impressed!

Parking is easy and free!

Visited during Sat for early lunch after dropping off cloop donations. Spacious and relaxed environment, with good and friendly service by the trainees and supervisor. Food portion is decent too and tastes good. Worth to support when you're in the area :)

The caf√© serves a variety of food and beverages, offering meals and promoting a meaningful cause. By dining at APSN Caf√©, customers directly support the empowerment and integration of individuals with special needs into the workforce.

You‚Äôre not just enjoying amazing food, you‚Äôre supporting a brighter, more inclusive future for all.

They are able to do baked goods, snacks, cookies, chocolates and etc. The cookies tasted really good!

I enjoy spending my time at the cafe for a hot cup of latte, my fave is their grilled spicy chicken. Their cookies are good too.

Most importantly I get to stay for a purpose. ü•∞

Love the people.

The cafe is nice and the people cooking are nice too.

Very nice and juicy peri peri chicken with tasty sides. I chose the two best ones.

Aircon on the cold side. Be prepared.
Nice book corner to peruse and you can contribute books too.

Got the Christmas menu for showroom and the best part is the log cake. So delicious and not too sweet. Love it
